name: Commentor
description:
Write the comments and explanations to your design in the Figma.


Version 2.0 β

How to use the plugin:

  • Select the layer and click «Create Comment»;
  • Enter the comment number and text;
  • Select the color of the label;


The plugin will automatically create a new frame with a comment next to the selected frame. Each comment will try to align against the selected layer.


Update Positions

If the coordinates of the layers associated with the comments have been changed, then the comments and labels will try to align next to it. This will work for the frames you have selected or for every frame on the page if you have not selected anything. This function is automatically called when a new comment is created.


Show/Hide Labels

Show or hide labels inside frames.


Remove unused labels

If you deleted a comment and want to remove unused label, use this function.


Limitations in the plugin:

- Plugin works on a single selected layer;

- The label field is optional and must be a number in the range 0 to 99;

- Functions "Show/Hide labels" and "Remove unused labels" work for all the frames on the page.
